0: We needed a place to stay for a few nights during our home renovation and wanted more than just a hotel room
This is an older property and there have some construction going on it looks like remodeling maybe
They have updated their lobby and eating areas in the past as well as maintained the grounds
We stayed in a renovated block which was nice but there is background noise in the area
Rooms need updating and cosmetic fixes
The room itself needs to be remodeled badly but even with that it was still clean and the beds were comfortable
Need updating of rooms good breakfast
The caulking in the bathroom is separating from the bathtub and fixtures and the baseboards are pulling away from the wall in the bathroom
Hotel presently being renovated and will be quite nice when completed
Have stayed there twice to allow for the completion of the renovation at Residence Inn
1: Lovely place to stay very beach inspired and newly built renovated a few maintenance items needing to be attended too but a really nice place to stay
This property was recently remodeled and was in beautiful condition
Rooms are large updated and clean the included breakfast is good fitness room is more than adequate
The units have been refurbished since our last visit
Its so beautiful inside the new renovation is perfect
The rooms have recently been renovated and are great
Great customer service clean and updated rooms parking is great even when busy
Really nicely updated and conveniently located to the Manhattan beach
The rooms have been refurbished and are beautiful
Love our stay here while our home was having repairs done
